general.tooltipTechnicalName: A technical name has to be unique and cannot be changed later.
general.tooltipType: The type cannot be changed later.

list.textDeleteConfirm: Do you really want to delete the set "{name}" ?
list.helpTextGlobalSet: This set is global and cannot be edited.

detail.labelCheckboxTranslated: Manage labels in all administration languages
detail.emptyStateDescription: Before you can add a custom field you have to save this set.

detail.helpTextMultiSelect: The multi select option cannot be toggled once the custom field has been created.
detail.helpTextEntitySelect: The entity type cannot be changed once the custom field has been created.
detail.tooltipCustomFieldPosition: Controls this custom field's position on detail pages.
detail.infoText: If a custom field is created, the according snippet for all of your snippet sets will be created as well. The snippet will be named "customFields.{name}".
detail.tooltipAllowCustomerWrite: When active, the Store API is allowed to modify this field. This can be used to store custom data if adding new fields to the storefront. For example for new fields in the registration form.
detail.tooltipAllowCartExpose: Activate, to make this custom field available in the payload of shopping cart line items. This is required in order to initially use this custom field in the Rule Builder or custom templates.
detail.tooltipCartExposeDisabled: This setting can currently not be changed, because the custom field is in use by one or more conditions in the Rule Builder.

list.titleDeleteAction: Delete custom field | Delete custom fields
list.textDeleteActionConfirmation: Are you sure that you want to delete this custom field? | Are you sure that you want to delete these {count} custom fields?
